statements: SELECT * FROM medication_adherence
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_percentage FROM medication_adherence WHERE dosage_mg > 100
SELECT medication_name, recorded_date FROM medication_adherence ORDER BY recorded_date DESC
SELECT AVG(adherence_percentage) AS avg_adherence FROM medication_adherence
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence WHERE patient_id = 10
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence WHERE adherence_percentage >= 80 ORDER BY recorded_date DESC, dosage_mg ASC
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_percentage FROM medication_adherence WHERE dosage_mg > 100 ORDER BY adherence_percentage DESC
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM medication_adherence GROUP BY medication_name ORDER BY total_patients DESC
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, recorded_date FROM medication_adherence WHERE adherence_percentage < 70 ORDER BY medication_name ASC, recorded_date DESC
SELECT AVG(adherence_percentage) AS avg_adherence_percentage, medication_name FROM medication_adherence GROUP BY medication_name ORDER BY avg_adherence_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_medication;
SELECT medication_name, dosage_amount FROM patient_medication WHERE dosage_frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage_amount FROM patient_medication WHERE dosage_amount > 50;
SELECT medication_name, dosage_time FROM patient_medication ORDER BY dosage_time ASC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage_amount, adherence_status FROM medication_history WHERE adherence_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication WHERE dosage_amount > 50 ORDER BY medication_name DESC, dosage_time ASC
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage_amount FROM patient_medication WHERE dosage_frequency = 'daily'
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM patient_medication ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_medications FROM patient_medication GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_medications > 2
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage_amount, adherence_status FROM medication_history WHERE adherence_status = true ORDER BY dosage_time DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications;
SELECT * FROM medication_history WHERE dosage_taken > 10;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, date_time FROM patients JOIN medication_history ON patients.patient_id = medication_history.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE dosage > 100 AND frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT patient_name, age, height, weight FROM patients WHERE height >= 160 AND weight <= 70;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, reason FROM medications WHERE reason LIKE '%headache%' ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient;
SELECT name, age, phone_number FROM patient WHERE age > 50;
SELECT model, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM wearable_device ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, dosage, frequency FROM medication WHERE frequency = 'daily';

SELECT patient.name, medication.name, dosage_taken, timestamp FROM dosage_history JOIN patient ON dosage_history.patient_id = patient.id JOIN medication ON dosage_history.medication_id = medication.id;
SELECT * FROM patient;
SELECT name, age, phone_number FROM patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT id, model, purchase_date FROM wearable_device ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, dosage, frequency FROM medication WHERE dosage > 50 AND frequency='Twice a day';

SELECT patient.id, patient.name, medication.name, dosage_taken, timestamp FROM patient JOIN dosage_history ON patient.id = dosage_history.patient_id JOIN medication ON medication.id = dosage_history.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT med_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY med_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices WHERE battery_status < 20;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT med_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE med_type = 'Painkiller';
SELECT patient_name, med_name, adherence_status FROM Patients JOIN Adherence ON Patients.patient_id = Adherence.patient_id;
SELECT device_name, last_sync, battery_status FROM WearableDevices WHERE battery_status < 30;
